name: FengShuiTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
A Skill Flash Briefing to help you Sell and Buy a home, from Jackie Lynaugh, “Realtor with a Heart of Gold.”

A quick overview of news and other content such as staging your home. A flash briefing skill provides content for seller’s needs. 

Buyers and Sellers will discover the latest and greatest real estate news, real-time financial information, and market data. Get a neighborhood snapshot anywhere in the USA, out and about area interest, market updates, and how to add value to the largest investment in your lifetime, Your Home. 

Try saying things like:
“Alexa, ask what’s selling in Chapel Hill.” 
“Alexa, ask Realtor with a Heart of Gold neighborhood snapshot.”
“Alexa, ask Jackie Lynaugh, to hear the latest real estate market update.”
“Alexa, ask Realtor with a Heart of Gold, for latest staging trends.
“Alexa, do you know of a Realtor in Chapel Hill, North Carolina.”

We’re constantly updating and refining our skill’s functionality to keep track of home sales and the real estate market. Have a comment, suggestion, or question? Reach out to us at yourehomesnc@gmail.com. Visit us at www.JackieLynaugh.com for the latest and greatest in real estate. Selling or buying a home anywhere in the USA call me at 919-218-0915.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
